CustomField.description: This field is used in ICON ios to get the the last spent amount according to the user currency
CustomField.formula: CASE( $User.Currency__c , 'EUR', Last36MSpendEUR__c , 'USD', Last36MSpendUSD__c , 'JPY', Last36MSpendYEN__c , 'CNY', Last36MSpendYUAN__c , Last36MSpendUSD__c )
CustomField.label: Last 36M Spend
